author: lawfx
message: Wakey wakey! Breakfast time!
I'm hungry...isn't it time for breakfast already?
Why eat breakfast alone? It's butter to have it together!
Psst...hey you...yeah you, come here... Wanna prepare breakfast?
Ahoy, me hearties! Get the rum! Uh... I mean... the bread and butter...
Mmm, you smell that? Me neither... *stomach growls* :rolling_eyes:
:fork_and_knife: :bread: :cheese: :croissant: :coffee: :tea: :pancakes: :bacon: :milk:

author: lawfx
message: Gather your thoughts! Stand up time!
Ready to let the world know of your progress?

Between you and me... isn't it time for something?
*hint: it involves standing up*
Time to stand up and take your usual spot. You know what's next :speaking_head:

My hooves are sweaty, knees weak, legs are heavy
Stop adding bugs in Jira already, code's spaghetti
I'm nervous, but on the surface I look calm and ready
Time to stand up, and say on what I keep on progressin'
When one door opens, an other closes, or is it the other way around? Who cares... stand up time!
Sometimes not speaking says more than all the words in the world. But this isn't the case now, because it's stand up time!

Nagpaabut ako kanimo
I guess you didn't understand that, so try to keep your stand up speech easier to follow :ear:
S to the T to the A to the N to the D! I say STAND you say UP! STAND...!

Stand up time!
You expected some unfunny, stupid joke along with that huh? Well, if you have any suggestions, let Nikos know and he'll add it to my JSON arra...eeeh I mean he'll teach it to me! :robot: :unicorn:
By the power granted to me by...well, noone...I declare stand up time!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tg97JiBn1kE
:regional_indicator_s: :regional_indicator_t: :regional_indicator_a: :regional_indicator_n: :regional_indicator_d:     :regional_indicator_u: :regional_indicator_p:

author: lawfx
message: :gift: May your Christmas sparkle and your holiday overflow with gifts and love. Merry Christmas! :gift:

author: lawfx
message: :tada: Happy New Year! Wait, am I supposed to be writing more?! Sorry, I'm at a loss for words... or my creator was! :tada:

author: lawfx
message: Nagpaabut ako kanimo
